topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551390676368724724dd0300#post_551390676368724724dd0300
Cause he simply didn't fucking care about morality and didn't have a real reason to.  He essentially went "#yolo" and did that to her.

He easily won the "most fucked up villain" for over a decade cause of the shit he did.

You know how the nazis did all kinds of fucked up experiments to humans cause "fuck it"?  Imagine if someone made something like that in a anime; that's essentially what it was, cause there was no reason other than he felt like seeing what would happen.

yes I meant the King. (I'm getting sick of these typos) 

But Holy shit *YES THAT CHAPTER WAS HYPE*. 

Also one of the things I love about this Manga is they KNOW that Saitama is OP as shit.

So What do they do to counter that? Add some equally as Badass Characters to the Series to have fights that are LONG AND SICK!
